issue.title: [Rust] Evaluate latest snapshot flatc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10832](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10832). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Flatc 1.12.0 generates incorrect code [https://github.com/google/flatbuffers/issues/5849](https://github.com/google/flatbuffers/issues/5849)

Let's try snapshort flatc built from flatbuffers source: looks good with just several adaptions.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10832?focusedCommentId=17248620) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
